title: Bellevue AJ Style Floor Lamp
body: After the year of the Great Depression in 1929, Arne Jacobsen made a design for the Future House. Thus, Bellevue AJ Style Floor Lamp was born with the embodiment of minimalism of the Modernist Movement with the functionalism of Bauhaus. This is actually Arne Jacobsenâ€™s first lamp design and after so many decades, it is still one of the most famous and most bought design in history.
